title: PingPlotter.Pro.v3.20p.Cracked-iNViSiBLE
description:
PingPlotter Pro v3.20p

/*-------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/


              PingPlotter is a network troubleshooting and        
              diagnostic tool for Windows 98, ME, 2000, 2003      
              and XP. It uses a combination of traceroute,        
              ping, and whois to collect data quickly, and then   
              allows you to continue to collect data over time    
              to give you the information you really need to      
              identify problems (both short-term and long-term    
              trends).                                            
                                                                  
              PingPlotter is unique in its ability to collect     
              data (over a period of hours, days or weeks), and   
              then allow you to focus on particular aspects of    
              that data to determine where the problem is         
              happening. PingPlotter graphically shows problems   
              in a way that allows you to shorten the time it     
              takes to pinpoint a problem.                        

             <a href=" http://www.pingplotter.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.pingplotter.com/</a>                         


/*-------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/


              Unpack, Install.                                    
              Add following line in \\\&#039;hosts\\\&#039; file which is located 
              in %windir%\\\\system32\\\\drivers\\\\etc                    
                                                                  
              127.0.0.1    www.pingplotter.com                    
                                                                  
              Or use firewall to prevent application from         
              online validation.                                  
              Copy cracked files from /iNViSiBLE dir to app dir.  
              Double-click on iNViSiBLE.reg to add information    
              to registry.                                        
                                                                  
              NOTE                                                
              If you occasionally launched cracked version        
              without blocking app from internet, just delete     
              following registry key:                             
              HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\\\SOFTWARE\\\\Nessoft\\\\PingPlotter     
              Pro\\\\User                                            
              and register app again using iNViSiBLE.reg          
              Enjoy!                                              
              If you like this app, BUY iT!



 

                                      iNViSiBLE
